snippet: Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras seems to have helped his standing by calling for more of the required sacrifices to fall heavily on the country’s oligarchs.
abstract: Greek Prime Min Alexis Tsipras has maintained surprising level of domestic political support as he brings home bailout deal that backtracks on several of his campaign promises; many perceive Tispras as having gotten best deal possible, and believe that he will maintain his populist values as he distributes deal's burdens.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras seems to have helped his standing by calling for more of the required sacrifices to fall heavily on the country’s oligarchs.

headline.main: Tsipras Is Seen as Retaining Greeks’ Approval While Selling Tough Bailout Deal
headline.print_headline: Greek Leader Retains Support While Selling Bailout
